item.title: Beogram 4000: MMC Cartridge Mount Restoration
item.description:
A Beogram 4000 tonearm from Western Australia needed repair because its MMC cartridge mount had broken off, a common issue with these models. Unlike later models with soldered wiring, this older model has a plug-in tonearm, which complicates the mount replacement. The old mount, held by glue, had to be carefully removed. Heating the arm softens the glue, allowing for the broken mount’s removal. This process was used for both the Australian tonearm and another one undergoing restoration...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-mmc-cartridge-mount-restoration/
